   19: %%
   20: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
   21: %%% Purpose: string test suite.
   22: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   23: -module(string_SUITE).
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: 
   26: %% Test server specific exports
   27: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   28: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   29: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   30: 
   31: %% Test cases must be exported.
   32: -export([is_empty/1, length/1, to_graphemes/1,
   33:          reverse/1, slice/1,
   34:          equal/1,
   35:          pad/1, trim/1, chomp/1, take/1,
   36:          uppercase/1, lowercase/1, titlecase/1, casefold/1,
   37:          to_integer/1,to_float/1,
   38:          prefix/1, split/1, replace/1, find/1,
   39:          lexemes/1, nth_lexeme/1, cd_gc/1, meas/1
   40:         ]).
   41: 
   42: -export([len/1,old_equal/1,old_concat/1,chr_rchr/1,str_rstr/1]).
   43: -export([span_cspan/1,substr/1,old_tokens/1,chars/1]).
   44: -export([copies/1,words/1,strip/1,sub_word/1,left_right/1]).
   45: -export([sub_string/1,centre/1, join/1]).
   46: -export([old_to_integer/1,old_to_float/1]).
   47: -export([to_upper_to_lower/1]).
   48: 
   49: %% Run tests when debugging them
   50: -export([debug/0, time_func/4]).
   51: -compile([nowarn_deprecated_function]).
   52: 
   53: suite() ->
   54:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   55:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   56: 
   57: all() ->
   58:     [{group, chardata}, {group, list_string}].
   59: 
   60: groups() ->
   61:     [{chardata,
   62:       [is_empty, length, to_graphemes,
   63:        equal, reverse, slice,
   64:        pad, trim, chomp, take,
   65:        lexemes, nth_lexeme,
   66:        to_integer, to_float,
   67:        uppercase, lowercase, titlecase, casefold,
   68:        prefix, find, split, replace, cd_gc,
   69:        meas]},
   70:      {list_string,
   71:       [len, old_equal, old_concat, chr_rchr, str_rstr, span_cspan,
   72:        substr, old_tokens, chars, copies, words, strip, sub_word,
   73:        left_right, sub_string, centre, join, old_to_integer,
   74:        old_to_float, to_upper_to_lower]}].
   75: 
   76: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   77:     Config.
   78: 
   79: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   80:     ok.
   81: 
   82: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   83:     Config.
   84: 
   85: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   86:     Config.
   87: 
   88: 
   89: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   90:     Config.
   91: 
   92: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   93:     ok.
   94: 
   95: debug() ->
   96:     Config = [{data_dir, "./" ++ ?MODULE_STRING++"_data"}],
   97:     [io:format("~p:~p~n",[Test,?MODULE:Test(Config)]) ||
   98:         {_,Tests} <- groups(), Test <- Tests].
   99: 
  100: -define(TEST(B,C,D), test(?LINE,?FUNCTION_NAME,B,C,D, true)).
  101: 
  102: -define(TEST_NN(B,C,D),
  103:         test(?LINE,?FUNCTION_NAME,B,C,D, false),
  104:         test(?LINE,?FUNCTION_NAME,hd(C),[B|tl(C)],D, false)).
  105: 
  106: -define(TRY(Exp),
  107:         fun() ->
  108:                 try Exp
  109:                 catch _E:Reason:_ST ->
  110:                         %% io:format("~p:~w: ~p: ~.0p ~p~n",
  111:                         %%           [?FUNCTION_NAME, ?LINE,_E,Reason, hd(_ST)]),
  112:                         {'EXIT', Reason}
  113:                 end
  114:         end()).
  115: 
  116: is_empty(_) ->
  117:     ?TEST("", [], true),
  118:     ?TEST([""|<<>>], [], true),
  119:     ?TEST("a", [], false),
  120:     ?TEST([""|<<$a>>], [], false),
  121:     ?TEST(["",[<<>>]], [], true),
  122:     ok.
  123: 
  124: length(_) ->
  125:     %% invalid arg type
  126:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch string:length({})),
  127:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch string:length(foo)),
  128:     %% Valid signs
  129:     ?TEST("", [], 0),
  130:     ?TEST([""|<<>>], [], 0),
  131:     L = tuple_size(list_to_tuple(atom_to_list(?MODULE))),
  132:     ?TEST(atom_to_list(?MODULE), [], L),
  133:     ?TEST("Hello", [], 5),
  134:     ?TEST("UC Ω ßð", [], 7),
  135:     ?TEST(["abc"|<<"abc">>], [], 6),
  136:     ?TEST(["abc",["def"]], [], 6),
  137:     ?TEST([<<97/utf8, 778/utf8, 98/utf8>>, [776,111,776]], [], 3), %% åäö in nfd
  138: 
  139:     InvalidUTF8 = <<192,192>>,
  140:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = ?TRY(string:length(InvalidUTF8)),
  141:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = ?TRY(string:length(<<$a, InvalidUTF8/binary, $z>>)),
  142:     ok.
  143: 
  144: equal(_) ->
  145:     %% invalid arg type
  146:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch string:equal(1, 2)),
  147:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch string:equal(1, 2, foo)),
  148:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch string:equal(1, 2, true, foo)),
  149: 
  150:     ?TEST("", [<<"">>], true),
  151:     ?TEST("Hello", ["Hello"], true),
  152:     ?TEST("Hello", ["Hell"], false),
  153:     ?TEST("Hello", ["Hello!"], false),
  154:     ?TEST("Hello", [<<"Hello"/utf8>>], true),
  155:     ?TEST("Hello", [<<"Mello"/utf8>>], false),
  156:     ?TEST("Hello", [<<"Hello!"/utf8>>], false),
  157:     ?TEST(["Hello",[" deep"]], ["Hello deep"], true),
  158:     ?TEST(["Hello",[<<" deep"/utf8>>]], ["Hello deep"], true),
  159:     ?TEST("Hello deep", [["Hello", [" deep"]]], true),
  160:     ?TEST("Hello deep", [["Hello", [" d!eep"]]], false),
  161:     ?TEST("Hello deep", [["Hello", [<<" deep"/utf8>>]]], true),
  162:     false = string:equal("Åäö", [<<97/utf8, 778/utf8, 98/utf8>>, [776,111,776]]), %% nfc vs nfd
  163: 
  164:     %% case_insensitive_equal()
  165:     ?TEST("", ["", true], true),
  166:     ?TEST("a", ["b", true], false),
  167:     ?TEST("", [<<>>, true], true),
  168:     ?TEST("", [[<<>>,[]], true], true),
  169:     ?TEST("", [[<<>>,[$a]], true], false),
  170:     ?TEST("123", ["123", true], true),
  171:     ?TEST("abc", ["abc", true], true),
  172:     ?TEST([[],<<>>,"ABC"|<<>>], [["abc",[]], true], true),
  173:     ?TEST("ABCa", ["abcå", true], false),
  174:     ?TEST("åäö", [{norm,"åäö"}, true], true),
  175:     ?TEST("ÅÄÖ", [{norm,"åäö"}, true], true),
  176:     ?TEST("MICHAŁ", ["michał", true], true),
  177:     ?TEST(["Mic",<<"HAŁ"/utf8>>], ["michał", true], true),
  178:     ?TEST("ß SHARP S", ["ss sharp s", true], true),
  179:     ?TEST("ẞ SHARP S", [[<<$ß/utf8, $\s>>,"SHARP S"], true], true),
  180:     ?TEST("ẞ SHARP ß", ["ss sharp s", true], false),
  181:     ?TEST(<<"İ I WITH DOT ABOVE"/utf8>>, ["i̇ i with dot above", true], true),
  182:     %% These should be equivalent with the above
  183:     true = string:equal(string:casefold(["Mic",<<"HAŁ"/utf8>>]), string:casefold("michał")),
  184:     true = string:equal(string:casefold("ẞ SHARP S"), string:casefold([<<$ß/utf8, $\s>>,"SHARP S"])),
  185:     false = string:equal(string:casefold("ẞ SHARP ß"), string:casefold("ss sharp s")),
  186: 
  187:     %% Normalization
  188:     ?TEST_NN("", ["", true, none], true),
  189:     ?TEST_NN("a", ["b", true, nfc], false),
  190:     ?TEST_NN("a", ["b", true, nfd], false),
  191:     ?TEST_NN("a", ["b", true, nfkc], false),
  192:     ?TEST_NN("a", ["b", true, nfkd], false),
  193: 
  194:     ?TEST_NN("a", ["A", false, nfc], false),
  195:     ?TEST_NN("a", ["A", false, nfd], false),
  196:     ?TEST_NN([<<>>,"a"|<<>>], ["A", true, nfkc], true),
  197:     ?TEST_NN(<<"a">>, ["A", true, nfkd], true),
  198: 
  199:     ?TEST_NN([$a, <<$b>>, [97,776]], ["abä", false, none], false),
  200:     ?TEST_NN([$a, <<$b>>, [97,776]], ["abä", false, nfc], true),
  201:     ?TEST_NN([$a, <<$b>>, [97,776]], ["abä", false, nfd], true),
  202:     ?TEST_NN([$a, <<$b>>, [97,776]], ["abä", false, nfkc], true),
  203:     ?TEST_NN([$a, <<$b>>, [97,776]], ["abä", false, nfkd], true),
  204: 
  205:     ?TEST_NN([$a, <<$b>>, [97,776]], ["abÄ", true, none], false),
  206:     ?TEST_NN([$a, <<$b>>, [97,776]], ["abÄ", false, nfc], false),
  207:     ?TEST_NN([$a, <<$b>>, [97,776]], ["abÄ", true, nfc], true),
  208:     ?TEST_NN([$a, <<$b>>, [97,776]], ["abÄ", true, nfd], true),
  209:     ?TEST_NN([$a, <<$b>>, [97,776]], ["abÄ", true, nfkc], true),
  210:     ?TEST_NN([$a, <<$b>>, [97,776]], ["abÄ", true, nfkd], true),
  211: 
  212:     ?TEST_NN([$a, <<$b>>, "ホンダ"], ["abﾎﾝﾀﾞ", true, none], false),
  213:     ?TEST_NN([$a, <<$b>>, "ホンダ"], ["abﾎﾝﾀﾞ", true, nfc], false),
  214:     ?TEST_NN([$a, <<$b>>, "ホンダ"], ["abﾎﾝﾀﾞ", true, nfd], false),
  215:     ?TEST_NN([$a, <<$b>>, "ホンダ"], ["abﾎﾝﾀﾞ", true, nfkc], true),
  216:     ?TEST_NN([$a, <<$b>>, "ホンダ"], ["abﾎﾝﾀﾞ", true, nfkd], true),
  217: 
  218:     ?TEST_NN([$a, <<$b>>, "32"], ["ab３２", true, none], false),
  219:     ?TEST_NN([$a, <<$b>>, "32"], ["ab３２", true, nfc], false),
  220:     ?TEST_NN([$a, <<$b>>, "32"], ["ab３２", true, nfd], false),
  221:     ?TEST_NN([$a, <<$b>>, "32"], ["ab３２", true, nfkc], true),
  222:     ?TEST_NN([$a, <<$b>>, "32"], ["ab３２", true, nfkd], true),
  223: 
  224:     %% Coverage.
  225:     ?TEST("", [<<"">>, false, nfc], true),
  226:     ?TEST("", [<<"">>, true, nfc], true),
  227: 
  228:     ok.
  229: 
  230: to_graphemes(_) ->
  231:     %% More tests are in unicode_util_SUITE.erl
  232:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch unicode:characters_to_nfd_binary(["asdåäö", an_atom])),
  233:     String = ["abc..åäö", $e, 788, <<"Ωµe`è"/utf8>>, "œŒþæÆħ§ß"],
  234:     NFD = unicode:characters_to_nfd_list(String),
  235:     [] = string:to_graphemes([]),
  236:     [] = string:to_graphemes(<<>>),
  237:     GCs = string:to_graphemes(String),
  238:     true = erlang:length(GCs) =:= string:length(String),
  239:     true = erlang:length(GCs) =:= erlang:length(string:to_graphemes(NFD)),
  240:     true = erlang:length(GCs) =:=
  241:         erlang:length(string:to_graphemes(unicode:characters_to_nfc_list(String))),
  242: 
  243:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = ?TRY(string:to_graphemes(<<$a,192,192,$z>>)),
  244:     ok.
  245: 
  246: reverse(_) ->
  247:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch string:reverse(2)),
  248:     Str1 = "Hello ",
  249:     Str2 = "Ω ßð",
  250:     Str3 = "åäö",
  251:     ?TEST("", [], ""),
  252:     ?TEST(Str1, [], lists:reverse(Str1)),
  253:     ?TEST(Str2, [], lists:reverse(Str2)),
  254:     ?TEST(Str3, [], lists:reverse(Str3)),
  255:     true = string:reverse(Str3) =:= lists:reverse(string:to_graphemes(Str3)),
  256: 
  257:     InvalidUTF8 = <<192,192>>,
  258:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = ?TRY(string:reverse(InvalidUTF8)),
  259:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = ?TRY(string:reverse(<<$a, InvalidUTF8/binary, $z>>)),
  260: 
  261:     ok.
  262: 
  263: slice(_) ->
  264:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch string:slice(2, 2, 2)),
  265:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch string:slice("asd", foo, 2)),
  266:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch string:slice("asd", 2, -1)),
  267:     ?TEST("", [3], ""),
  268:     ?TEST("aåä", [1, 0], ""),
  269:     ?TEST("aåä", [3], ""),
  270:     ?TEST("aåäöbcd", [3], "öbcd"),
  271:     ?TEST([<<"aå"/utf8>>,"äöbcd"], [3], "öbcd"),
  272:     ?TEST([<<"aåä"/utf8>>,"öbcd"], [3], "öbcd"),
  273:     ?TEST([<<"aåä"/utf8>>,"öbcd"], [3, infinity], "öbcd"),
  274: 
  275:     ?TEST("", [3, 2], ""),
  276:     ?TEST("aåä", [3, 2], ""),
  277:     ?TEST("aåäöbcd", [3,2], "öb"),
  278:     ?TEST([<<"aå"/utf8>>,"äöbcd"], [3,3], "öbc"),
  279:     ?TEST([<<"aåä"/utf8>>,"öbcd"], [3,10], "öbcd"),
  280: 
  281:     InvalidUTF8 = <<192,192>>,
  282:     [$b, $c|InvalidUTF8] = string:slice(["abc", InvalidUTF8], 1),
  283:     InvalidUTF8 = string:slice(["abc", InvalidUTF8], 3),
  284:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = ?TRY(string:slice(["abc", InvalidUTF8], 1, 5)),
  285:     BadUtf8 = <<$a, InvalidUTF8/binary, "teststring">>,
  286:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = ?TRY(string:slice(BadUtf8, 2)),
  287:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = ?TRY(string:slice(BadUtf8, 1, 5)),
  288:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = ?TRY(string:slice(BadUtf8, 0, 5)),
  289:     ok.
  290: 
  291: pad(_) ->
  292:     Str = "Hallå",
  293:     ?TEST(Str, [7], "Hallå  "),
  294:     ?TEST(Str, [7, leading], "  Hallå"),
  295:     ?TEST(Str, [4, both, $.], "Hallå"),
  296:     ?TEST(Str, [10, both, $.], "..Hallå..."),
  297:     ?TEST(Str, [10, leading, $.], ".....Hallå"),
  298:     ?TEST(Str, [10, trailing, $.], "Hallå....."),
  299:     ?TEST(Str++["f"], [10, trailing, $.], "Hallåf...."),
  300:     ?TEST(Str++[" flåwer"], [10, trailing, $.], "Hallå flåwer"),
  301: 
  302:     InvalidUTF8 = <<192,192>>,
  303:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = ?TRY(string:pad(InvalidUTF8, 10, both, $.)),
  304:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = ?TRY(string:pad(<<$a, InvalidUTF8/binary, $z>>, 10, both, $.)),
  305:     ok.
  306: 
  307: trim(_) ->
  308:     Str = "\t\s..Ha\s.llå..\t\n\r",
  309:     ?TEST("", [], ""),
  310:     ?TEST(Str, [both, "x"], Str),
  311:     ?TEST(Str, [leading], "..Ha\s.llå..\t\n\r"),
  312:     ?TEST(Str, [trailing], "\t\s..Ha\s.llå.."),
  313:     ?TEST(Str, [], "..Ha .llå.."),
  314:     ?TEST(".. ", [both, ""], ".. "),
  315:     ?TEST([<<".. ">>], [both, ". "], ""),
  316:     ?TEST(".. h.ej ..", [leading, ". "], "h.ej .."),
  317:     ?TEST(".. h.ej ..", [trailing, ". "], ".. h.ej"),
  318:     ?TEST(".. h.ej ..", [both, ". "], "h.ej"),
  319:     ?TEST(["..", <<"h.ej">>, ".."], [both, ". "], "h.ej"),
  320:     ?TEST([[], "..", " h.ej ", <<"..">>], [both, ". "], "h.ej"),
  321:     ?TEST([<<>>,<<"..">>, " h.ej", <<" ..">>], [both, ". "], "h.ej"),
  322:     ?TEST([<<>>,<<"..">>, " h.ej", <<" ..">>], [trailing, ". "], ".. h.ej"),
  323:     ?TEST([<<"..  h.ej .">>, <<"..">>], [both, ". "], "h.ej"),
  324:     ?TEST(["..h", ".e", <<"j..">>], [both, ". "], "h.ej"),
  325:     ?TEST(["..h", <<".ejsa"/utf8>>, "n.."], [both, ". "], "h.ejsan"),
  326:     %% Test that it behaves with graphemes (i.e. nfd tests are the hard part)
  327:     ?TEST([1013,101,778,101,101], [trailing, [101]], [1013,101,778]),
  328:     ?TEST("aaåaa", [both, "a"], "å"),
  329:     ?TEST(["aaa",778,"äöoo"], [both, "ao"], "åäö"),
  330:     ?TEST([<<"aaa">>,778,"äöoo"], [both, "ao"], "åäö"),
  331:     ?TEST([<<"e">>,778,"åäöe", <<778/utf8>>], [both, [[$e,778]]], "åäö"),
  332:     ?TEST([[<<"!v">>|<<204,128,$v,204,129>>]],[trailing, [[$v,769]]], [$!,$v,768]),
  333:     ?TEST([[[<<"v">>|<<204,129,118,204,128,118>>],769,118,769]], [trailing, [[118,769]]], [$v,769,$v,768]),
  334:     ?TEST([<<"vv">>|<<204,128,118,204,128>>], [trailing, [[118,768]]], "v"),
  335: 
  336:     InvalidUTF8 = <<192,192>>,
  337:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = ?TRY(string:trim(InvalidUTF8, both, "az")),
  338:     %% Not checked  (using binary search)
  339:     %% {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = ?TRY(string:trim(<<$a, $b, InvalidUTF8/binary, $z>>, both, "az")),
  340:     ok.
  341: 
  342: chomp(_) ->
  343:     Str = "åäö\na\r\nsd\n",
  344:     Res = "åäö\na\r\nsd",
  345:     ?TEST("", [], ""),
  346:     ?TEST("\n", [], ""),
  347:     ?TEST("str \t", [], "str \t"),
  348:     ?TEST("str \t\n\r", [], "str \t\n\r"),
  349:     ?TEST(Str, [], Res),
  350:     ?TEST([Str,$\n], [], Res),
  351:     ?TEST([Str|"\n"], [], Res),
  352:     ?TEST([Str|<<"\n">>], [], Res),
  353:     ?TEST([Str,$\r|<<"\n">>], [], Res),
  354:     ?TEST([Str, <<$\r>>|"\n"], [], Res),
  355:     ?TEST([<<$a,$\r>>,"\na\n"], [], "a\r\na"),
  356:     ok.
  357: 
  358: take(_) ->
  359:     Str = "\t\s..Ha\s.llå..\t\n\r",
  360:     WS = "\t\s\n\r",
  361:     Chars = lists:seq($a,$z)++lists:seq($A,$Z),
  362:     %% complement=false, dir=leading
  363:     ?TEST("", ["abc"], {"",""}),
  364:     ?TEST(Str, ["x"], {[], Str}),
  365:     ?TEST(Str, [WS], {"\t\s","..Ha\s.llå..\t\n\r"}),
  366:     ?TEST(".. ", ["", false], {"", ".. "}),
  367:     ?TEST([<<".. ">>], [". ", false, leading], {".. ", ""}),
  368:     ?TEST(".. h.ej ..", [". ", false, leading], {".. ", "h.ej .."}),
  369:     ?TEST(["..", <<"h.ej">>, ".."], [". ", false, leading], {"..", "h.ej.."}),
  370:     ?TEST([[], "..", " h.ej ", <<"..">>], [". ", false, leading], {".. ","h.ej .."}),
  371:     ?TEST([<<>>,<<"..">>, " h.ej", <<" ..">>], [". ", false, leading], {".. ", "h.ej .."}),
  372:     ?TEST(["..h", <<".ejsa"/utf8>>, "n.."], [". ", false, leading], {"..", "h.ejsan.."}),
  373:     ?TEST([[<<101,204,138,33>>]], [[[$e,778]]], {[$e,778], "!"}),
  374:     %% Test that it behaves with graphemes (i.e. nfd tests are the hard part)
  375:     ?TEST("aaåaa", ["a", false, leading], {"aa", "åaa"}),
  376:     ?TEST(["aaa",778,"äöoo"], ["ao", false, leading], {"aa", "åäöoo"}),
  377:     ?TEST([<<"aaa">>,778,"äöoo"], ["ao",false,leading], {"aa", "åäöoo"}),
  378:     ?TEST([<<"e">>,778,"åäöe", <<778/utf8>>], [[[$e,778]], false, leading], {[$e,778],"åäöe"++[778]}),
  379: 
  380:     %% complement=true, dir=leading
  381:     ?TEST("", ["abc", true], {"",""}),
  382:     ?TEST(Str, ["x", true], {Str, []}),
  383:     ?TEST(Str, [Chars, true], {"\t\s..","Ha\s.llå..\t\n\r"}),
  384:     ?TEST(".. ", ["",true], {".. ", ""}),
  385:     ?TEST([<<".. ">>], [Chars, true, leading], {".. ", ""}),
  386:     ?TEST(".. h.ej ..", [Chars, true, leading], {".. ", "h.ej .."}),
  387:     ?TEST(["..", <<"h.ej">>, ".."], [Chars, true, leading], {"..", "h.ej.."}),
  388:     ?TEST([[], "..", " h.ej ", <<"..">>], [Chars, true, leading], {".. ","h.ej .."}),
  389:     ?TEST([<<>>,<<"..">>, " h.ej", <<" ..">>], [Chars, true, leading], {".. ", "h.ej .."}),
  390:     ?TEST(["..h", <<".ejsa"/utf8>>, "n.."], [Chars, true, leading], {"..", "h.ejsan.."}),
  391:     %% Test that it behaves with graphemes (i.e. nfd tests are the hard part)
  392:     ?TEST([101,778], [[[101, 779]], true], {[101,778], []}),
  393:     ?TEST(["aaee",778,"äöoo"], [[[$e,778]], true, leading], {"aae", [$e,778|"äöoo"]}),
  394:     ?TEST([<<"aae">>,778,"äöoo"], [[[$e,778]],true,leading], {"aa", [$e,778|"äöoo"]}),
  395:     ?TEST([<<"e">>,778,"åäöe", <<778/utf8>>], [[[$e,778]], true, leading], {[], [$e,778]++"åäöe"++[778]}),
  396: 
  397:     %% complement=false, dir=trailing
  398:     ?TEST(Str, ["", false, trailing], {Str, []}),
  399:     ?TEST(Str, ["x", false, trailing], {Str, []}),
  400:     ?TEST(Str, [WS, false,trailing], {"\t\s..Ha\s.llå..", "\t\n\r"}),
  401:     ?TEST(".. h.ej ..", [". ", false, trailing], {".. h.ej", " .."}),
  402:     ?TEST(["..", <<"h.ej">>, ".."], [". ", false, trailing], {"..h.ej", ".."}),
  403:     ?TEST([[], "..", " h.ej ", <<"..">>], [". ", false, trailing], {".. h.ej", " .."}),
  404:     ?TEST([<<>>,<<"..">>, " h.ej", <<" ..">>], [". ", false, trailing], {".. h.ej", " .."}),
  405:     ?TEST(["..h", <<".ejsa"/utf8>>, "n.."], [". ", false, trailing], {"..h.ejsan", ".."}),
  406:     ?TEST("aaåaa", ["a", false, trailing], {"aaå", "aa"}),
  407:     ?TEST([<<"KMÐ¨"/utf8>>], [[1064], false, trailing], {"KMÐ¨",[]}),
  408:     ?TEST([[<<"!\"">>|<<"\"">>]], ["\"", false, trailing], {"!", "\"\""}),
  409:     ?TEST([<<$v>>, 769], [[[$v,769]], false, trailing], {"", [$v,769]}),
  410:     ?TEST(["aaa",778,"äöoo"], ["ao", false, trailing], {"aaåäö", "oo"}),
  411:     ?TEST([<<"aaa">>,778,"äöoo"], ["ao", false, trailing], {"aaåäö", "oo"}),
  412:     ?TEST([<<"e">>,778,"åäöee", <<778/utf8>>], [[[$e,778]], false, trailing], {[$e,778|"åäöe"], [$e,778]}),
  413: 
  414:     %% complement=true, dir=trailing
  415:     ?TEST("", ["abc", true, trailing], {"",""}),
  416:     ?TEST(Str, ["x", true, trailing], {[], Str}),
  417:     %?TEST(Str, [{norm,Chars}, true, trailing], {"\t\s..Ha\s.ll","å..\t\n\r"}),
  418:     ?TEST(".. ", ["", true, trailing], {"", ".. "}),
  419:     ?TEST([<<".. ">>], [Chars, true, trailing], {"", ".. "}),
  420:     ?TEST(".. h.ej ..", [Chars, true, trailing], {".. h.ej", " .."}),
  421:     ?TEST(["..", <<"h.ej">>, ".."], [Chars, true, trailing], {"..h.ej", ".."}),
  422:     ?TEST([[], "..", " h.ej ", <<"..">>], [Chars, true, trailing], {".. h.ej"," .."}),
  423:     ?TEST([<<>>,<<"..">>, " h.ej", <<" ..">>], [Chars, true, trailing], {".. h.ej"," .."}),
  424:     ?TEST(["..h", <<".ejsa"/utf8>>, "n.."], [Chars, true, trailing], {"..h.ejsan", ".."}),
  425:     ?TEST([[<<101,204,138,33>>]], [[[$e,778]], true, trailing], {[$e,778], "!"}),
  426:     ?TEST([<<"Fa">>], [[$F], true, trailing], {"F", "a"}),
  427:     ?TEST([[<<101,101,204,138>>,1045,778]], ["e", true, trailing], {"e", [101,778,1045,778]}),
  428:     ?TEST([[<<101,101,204,138>>,<<1045/utf8,778/utf8>>]], ["e", true, trailing], {"e", [101,778,1045,778]}),
  429:     ?TEST([[[118,769,118],<<204,129,118,204,129,120,204,128,118>>,768,120,768]],
  430:           [[[118,769]], true, trailing], {[118,769,118,769,118,769],[120,768,118,768,120,768]}),
  431:     ?TEST([[<<118,204,128,118>>|<<204,128,118,204,128,118,204,128,206,132,204,129,206,132,204,129>>]],
  432:           [[[118,768]], true, trailing], {[118,768,118,768,118,768,118,768], [900,769,900,769]}),
  433:     %% Test that it behaves with graphemes (i.e. nfd tests are the hard part)
  434:     ?TEST(["aaee",778,"äöoo"], [[[$e,778]], true, trailing], {"aae"++[$e,778], "äöoo"}),
  435:     ?TEST([<<"aae">>,778,"äöoo"], [[[$e,778]],true,trailing], {"aa"++[$e,778], "äöoo"}),
  436:     ?TEST([<<"e">>,778,"åäöe", <<778/utf8>>], [[[$e,778]], true, trailing], {[$e,778]++"åäöe"++[778], []}),
  437:     ?TEST([<<"e">>,778,"åäöe", <<778/utf8>>, $e, 779], [[[$e,778]], true, trailing],
  438:           {[$e,778]++"åäöe"++[778], [$e,779]}),
  439: 
  440:     InvalidUTF8 = <<192,192>>,
  441:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = ?TRY(string:take(InvalidUTF8, [$.], false, leading)),
  442:     %% Not checked  (using binary search)
  443:     %% {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = ?TRY(string:take(InvalidUTF8, [$.], true, leading)),
  444:     %% {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = ?TRY(string:take(InvalidUTF8, [$.], false, trailing)),
  445:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = ?TRY(string:take(InvalidUTF8, [$.], true, trailing)),
  446: 
  447:     ok.
  448: 
  449: 
  450: uppercase(_) ->
  451:     ?TEST("", [], ""),
  452:     ?TEST("123", [], "123"),
  453:     ?TEST("abc", [], "ABC"),
  454:     ?TEST("ABC", [], "ABC"),
  455:     ?TEST("abcdefghiljklmnopqrstvxyzåäö",[], "ABCDEFGHILJKLMNOPQRSTVXYZÅÄÖ"),
  456:     ?TEST("åäö  ", [], "ÅÄÖ  "),
  457:     ?TEST("ÅÄÖ  ", [], "ÅÄÖ  "),
  458:     ?TEST("Michał", [], "MICHAŁ"),
  459:     ?TEST(["Mic",<<"hał"/utf8>>], [], "MICHAŁ"),
  460:     ?TEST("ǉǇ", [], "ǇǇ"),
  461:     ?TEST("Ǉǉ", [], "ǇǇ"),
  462:     ?TEST("ß sharp s", [], "SS SHARP S"),
  463: 
  464:     InvalidUTF8 = <<192,192>>,
  465:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = ?TRY(string:uppercase(InvalidUTF8)),
  466:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = ?TRY(string:uppercase(<<$a, InvalidUTF8/binary, $z>>)),
  467: 
  468:     ok.
  469: 
  470: lowercase(_) ->
  471:     ?TEST("", [], ""),
  472:     ?TEST("123", [], "123"),
  473:     ?TEST("abc", [], "abc"),
  474:     ?TEST("ABC", [], "abc"),
  475:     ?TEST("åäö  ", [], "åäö  "),
  476:     ?TEST("ÅÄÖ  ", [], "åäö  "),
  477:     ?TEST("MICHAŁ", [], "michał"),
  478:     ?TEST(["Mic",<<"HAŁ"/utf8>>], [], "michał"),
  479:     ?TEST("ß SHARP S", [], "ß sharp s"),
  480:     ?TEST("İ I WITH DOT ABOVE", [], "i̇ i with dot above"),
  481: 
  482:     InvalidUTF8 = <<192,192>>,
  483:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = ?TRY(string:lowercase(InvalidUTF8)),
  484:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = ?TRY(string:lowercase(<<$a, InvalidUTF8/binary, $z>>)),
  485:     ok.
  486: 
  487: titlecase(_) ->
  488:     ?TEST("", [], ""),
  489:     ?TEST("123", [], "123"),
  490:     %% Titlecase is the same as uppercase for most chars
  491:     [?TEST([C,$x], [], string:uppercase([C])++[$x]) ||
  492:         C <-"abcdefghiljklmnopqrstvxyzåäö"],
  493:     %% Example of a different mapping
  494:     ?TEST("ǉusad", [],"ǈusad"),
  495:     ?TEST("ǉǇ", [], "ǈǇ"),
  496:     ?TEST("Ǉǉ", [], "ǈǉ"),
  497:     ?TEST("ß sharp s", [], "Ss sharp s"),
  498: 
  499:     InvalidUTF8 = <<192,192>>,
  500:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = ?TRY(string:titlecase(InvalidUTF8)),
  501:     <<$A, _/binary>> = ?TRY(string:titlecase(<<$a, InvalidUTF8/binary, $z>>)),
  502:     ok.
  503: 
  504: casefold(_) ->
  505:     ?TEST("", [], ""),
  506:     ?TEST("123", [], "123"),
  507:     ?TEST("abc", [], "abc"),
  508:     ?TEST("ABC", [], "abc"),
  509:     ?TEST("åäö  ", [], "åäö  "),
  510:     ?TEST("ÅÄÖ  ", [], "åäö  "),
  511:     ?TEST("MICHAŁ", [], "michał"),
  512:     ?TEST(["Mic",<<"HAŁ"/utf8>>], [], "michał"),
  513:     ?TEST("ß SHARP S", [], "ss sharp s"),
  514:     ?TEST("ẞ SHARP S", [], "ss sharp s"),
  515:     ?TEST("İ I WITH DOT ABOVE", [], "i̇ i with dot above"),
  516: 
  517:     InvalidUTF8 = <<192,192>>,
  518:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = ?TRY(string:casefold(InvalidUTF8)),
  519:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = ?TRY(string:casefold(<<$a, InvalidUTF8/binary, $z>>)),
  520:     ok.
  521: 
  522: 
  523: to_integer(_) ->
  524:     ?TEST("", [], {error, no_integer}),
  525:     ?TEST("-", [], {error, no_integer}),
  526:     ?TEST("01", [], {1, ""}),
  527:     ?TEST("1.53", [], {1, ".53"}),
  528:     ?TEST("+01.53", [], {1, ".53"}),
  529:     ?TEST("-1.53", [], {-1, ".53"}),
  530:     ?TEST("-13#16FF", [], {-13, "#16FF"}),
  531:     ?TEST("13xFF", [], {13, "xFF"}),
  532:     ?TEST(["234", <<"3+4-234">>], [], {2343, "+4-234"}),
  533:     ok.
  534: 
  535: to_float(_) ->
  536:     ?TEST("", [], {error, no_float}),
  537:     ?TEST("1.53", [], {1.53, ""}),
  538:     ?TEST("+01.53foo", [], {1.53, "foo"}),
  539:     ?TEST("-1.53foo", [], {-1.53, "foo"}),
  540:     ?TEST("-1,53foo", [], {-1.53, "foo"}),
  541:     ?TEST("-1,53e1foo", [], {-15.3, "foo"}),
  542:     ?TEST("-1,53e-1", [], {-0.153, ""}),
  543:     ?TEST("-1,53E-1+2", [], {-0.153, "+2"}),
  544:     ?TEST(["-1,53", <<"E-1+2">>], [], {-0.153, "+2"}),
  545:     ok.
  546: 
  547: prefix(_) ->
  548:     ?TEST("", ["a"], nomatch),
  549:     ?TEST("a", [""], "a"),
  550:     ?TEST("a", [[[]]], "a"),
  551:     ?TEST("a", [<<>>], "a"),
  552:     ?TEST("a", [[<<>>]], "a"),
  553:     ?TEST("a", [[[<<>>]]], "a"),
  554:     ?TEST("b", ["a"], nomatch),
  555:     ?TEST("a", ["a"], ""),
  556:     ?TEST("å", ["a"], nomatch),
  557:     ?TEST(["a",<<778/utf8>>], ["a"], nomatch),
  558:     ?TEST([<<"a"/utf8>>,778], ["a"], nomatch),
  559:     ?TEST("hejsan", [""], "hejsan"),
  560:     ?TEST("hejsan", ["hej"], "san"),
  561:     ?TEST("hejsan", ["hes"], nomatch),
  562:     ?TEST(["h", "ejsan"], ["hej"], "san"),
  563:     ?TEST(["h", "e", "jsan"], ["hej"], "san"),
  564:     ?TEST(["h", "e", "san"], ["hej"], nomatch),
  565:     ?TEST(["h", <<"ejsan">>], ["hej"], "san"),
  566:     ?TEST(["h", <<"e">>, "jsan"], ["hej"], "san"),
  567:     ?TEST(["h", "e", <<"jsan">>], ["hej"], "san"),
  568:     ok.
  569: 
  570: split(_) ->
  571:     Mod = fun(Res) ->
  572:                   [lists:flatten(unicode:characters_to_nfc_list(io_lib:format("~ts", [Str])))
  573:                    || Str <- Res] end,
  574:     ?TEST("..", ["", leading], {Mod, [".."]}),
  575:     ?TEST("..", ["..", leading], {Mod, [[],[]]}),
  576:     ?TEST("abcd", ["..", leading], {Mod, ["abcd"]}),
  577:     ?TEST("ab..bc", ["..", leading], {Mod, ["ab","bc"]}),
  578:     ?TEST("ab..bc..cd", ["..", leading], {Mod, ["ab","bc..cd"]}),
  579:     ?TEST("..ab", [".."], {Mod, [[],"ab"]}),
  580:     ?TEST("ab..", ["..", leading], {Mod, ["ab",[]]}),
  581:     ?TEST(["ab..bc..cd"], ["..", leading], {Mod, ["ab","bc..cd"]}),
  582:     ?TEST(["ab","..bc..cd"], ["..", leading], {Mod, ["ab","bc..cd"]}),
  583:     ?TEST(["ab",<<"..bc..cd">>], ["..", leading], {Mod, ["ab","bc..cd"]}),
  584:     ?TEST(["ab.",".bc..cd"], ["..", leading], {Mod, ["ab","bc..cd"]}),
  585:     ?TEST(["ab.",<<".bc..cd">>], ["..", leading], {Mod, ["ab","bc..cd"]}),
  586:     ?TEST(["ab..","bc..cd"], ["..", leading], {Mod, ["ab","bc..cd"]}),
  587:     ?TEST(["ab..",<<"bc..cd">>], ["..", leading], {Mod, ["ab","bc..cd"]}),
  588:     ?TEST(["ab.","bc..cd"], ["..", leading], {Mod, ["ab.bc","cd"]}),
  589:     ?TEST("ab...bc", ["..", leading], {Mod, ["ab",".bc"]}),
  590: 
  591:     ?TEST("..", ["", trailing], {Mod, [".."]}),
  592:     ?TEST("..", ["..", trailing], {Mod, [[],[]]}),
  593:     ?TEST("abcd", ["..", trailing], {Mod, ["abcd"]}),
  594:     ?TEST("ab..bc", ["..", trailing], {Mod, ["ab","bc"]}),
  595:     ?TEST("ab..bc..cd", ["..", trailing], {Mod, ["ab..bc","cd"]}),
  596:     ?TEST("..ab", ["..", trailing], {Mod, [[],"ab"]}),
  597:     ?TEST("ab..", ["..", trailing], {Mod, ["ab",[]]}),
  598:     ?TEST(["ab..bc..cd"], ["..", trailing], {Mod, ["ab..bc","cd"]}),
  599:     ?TEST(["ab","..bc..cd"], ["..", trailing], {Mod, ["ab..bc","cd"]}),
  600:     ?TEST(["ab"|<<"a">>], ["a", trailing], {Mod, ["ab",[]]}),
  601:     ?TEST(["ab",<<"..bc..cd">>], ["..", trailing], {Mod, ["ab..bc","cd"]}),
  602:     ?TEST([<<"ab.">>,".bc..cd"], ["..", trailing], {Mod, ["ab..bc","cd"]}),
  603:     ?TEST(["ab.",<<".bc..cd">>], ["..", trailing], {Mod, ["ab..bc","cd"]}),
  604:     ?TEST(["ab..","bc..cd"], ["..", trailing], {Mod, ["ab..bc","cd"]}),
  605:     ?TEST(["ab..",<<"bc..cd">>], ["..", trailing], {Mod, ["ab..bc","cd"]}),
  606:     ?TEST(["ab.","bc..cd"], ["..", trailing], {Mod, ["ab.bc","cd"]}),
  607:     ?TEST("ab...bc", ["..", trailing], {Mod, ["ab.","bc"]}),
  608: 
  609:     ?TEST("..", ["..", all], {Mod, [[],[]]}),
  610:     ?TEST("abcd", ["..", all], {Mod, ["abcd"]}),
  611:     ?TEST("a..b", ["..", all], {Mod, ["a","b"]}),
  612:     ?TEST("a..b..c", ["..", all], {Mod, ["a","b","c"]}),
  613:     ?TEST("a..", ["..", all], {Mod, ["a",[]]}),
  614:     ?TEST(["a..b..c"], ["..", all], {Mod, ["a","b","c"]}),
  615:     ?TEST(["a","..b..c"], ["..", all], {Mod, ["a","b","c"]}),
  616:     ?TEST(["a",<<"..b..c">>], ["..", all], {Mod, ["a","b","c"]}),
  617:     ?TEST(["a.",".b..c"], ["..", all], {Mod, ["a","b","c"]}),
  618:     ?TEST(["a.",<<".b..c">>], ["..", all], {Mod, ["a","b","c"]}),
  619:     ?TEST(["a..","b..c"], ["..", all], {Mod, ["a","b","c"]}),
  620:     ?TEST(["a..",<<"b..c">>], ["..", all], {Mod, ["a","b","c"]}),
  621:     ?TEST(["a.","b..c"], ["..", all], {Mod, ["a.b","c"]}),
  622:     ?TEST("a...b", ["..", all], {Mod, ["a",".b"]}),
  623: 
  624:     %% Grapheme (split) tests
  625:     ?TEST("aΩΩb", ["Ω", all], {Mod, ["a","","b"]}),
  626:     ?TEST([<<"aae">>,778,"äöoo"], [[$e,778], leading], {Mod, ["aa","äöoo"]}),
  627:     ?TEST([<<"aae">>,778,"äöoo"], [[$e,778], trailing], {Mod, ["aa","äöoo"]}),
  628:     ?TEST([<<"aae">>,778,"äöoo"], [[$e,778], all], {Mod, ["aa","äöoo"]}),
  629:     ?TEST([<<"aae">>,778,"öeeåäö"], ["e", leading], {Mod, [[$a, $a, $e,778,$ö],"eåäö"]}),
  630:     ?TEST([<<"aae">>,778,"öeeåäö"], ["e", trailing], {Mod, [[$a, $a, $e,778,$ö, $e],"åäö"]}),
  631:     ?TEST([<<"aae">>,778,"öeeåäö"], ["e", all], {Mod, [[$a, $a, $e,778,$ö],"", "åäö"]}),
  632: 
  633:     ok.
  634: 
  635: replace(_) ->
  636:     ?TEST(["a..b.", [".c"]], ["xxx", "::"], "a..b..c"),
  637:     ?TEST(["a..b.", [".c"]], ["..", "::"], "a::b..c"),
  638:     ?TEST([<<"a..b.">>, [".c"]], ["..", "::", trailing], "a..b::c"),
  639:     ?TEST(["a..b.", [".c"]], ["..", "::", all], "a::b::c"),
  640:     ok.
  641: 
  642: cd_gc(_) ->
  643:     [] = string:next_codepoint(""),
  644:     [] = string:next_codepoint(<<>>),
  645:     [] = string:next_codepoint([<<>>]),
  646:     [$a|""] = string:next_codepoint("a"),
  647:     [$a|<<>>] = string:next_codepoint(<<"a">>),
  648:     [$a|[<<>>,$b]] = string:next_codepoint([<<"a">>,$b]),
  649:     "abcd" = string:next_codepoint("abcd"),
  650:     [$e|[778]] = string:next_codepoint([$e,778]),
  651:     [$e|<<204,138>>] = string:next_codepoint(<<$e,778/utf8>>),
  652:     [778|<<>>] = string:next_codepoint(tl(string:next_codepoint(<<$e,778/utf8>>))),
  653:     [0|<<128,1>>] = string:next_codepoint(<<0,128,1>>),
  654:     {error,<<128,1>>} = string:next_codepoint(<<128,1>>),
  655:     [128021|<<>>] = string:next_codepoint(<<128021/utf8>>), %% Dog
  656:     [128021|<<8205/utf8>>] = string:next_codepoint(<<128021/utf8,8205/utf8>>), %% Dog + ZWJ
  657:     [128021|<<8205/utf8,129466/utf8>>] = string:next_codepoint(<<128021/utf8,8205/utf8,129466/utf8>>), %% Dog + ZWJ + Service vest == Service dog
  658: 
  659:     [] = string:next_grapheme(""),
  660:     [] = string:next_grapheme(<<>>),
  661:     [] = string:next_grapheme([<<>>]),
  662:     [$a|""] = string:next_grapheme("a"),
  663:     [$a|<<>>] = string:next_grapheme(<<"a">>),
  664:     [$a|[<<>>,$b]] = string:next_grapheme([<<"a">>,$b]),
  665:     "abcd" = string:next_grapheme("abcd"),
  666:     [[$e,778]|""] = string:next_grapheme([$e,778]),
  667:     [[$e,778]|<<>>] = string:next_grapheme(<<$e,778/utf8>>),
  668:     [0|<<128,1>>] = string:next_grapheme(<<0,128,1>>),
  669:     {error,<<128,1>>} = string:next_grapheme(<<128,1>>),
  670:     [128021|<<>>] = string:next_grapheme(<<128021/utf8>>), %% Dog
  671:     [[128021,8205]|<<>>] = string:next_grapheme(<<128021/utf8,8205/utf8>>), %% Dog + ZWJ
  672:     [[128021,8205,129466]|<<>>] = string:next_grapheme(<<128021/utf8,8205/utf8,129466/utf8>>), %% Dog + ZWJ + Service vest == Service dog
  673: 
  674:     ok.
  675: 
  676: 
  677: find(_) ->
  678:     ?TEST(["h", "ejsan"], [""], "hejsan"),
  679:     ?TEST(["h", "ejsan"], [<<>>], "hejsan"),
  680:     ?TEST([], [""], ""),
  681:     ?TEST([], ["hej"], nomatch),
  682:     ?TEST(["h", "ejsan"], ["hej"], "hejsan"),
  683:     ?TEST(["h", "e", "jsan"], ["hej"], "hejsan"),
  684:     ?TEST(["xh", "e", "san"], ["hej"], nomatch),
  685:     ?TEST([<<"xh">>, <<"ejsan">>], ["hej"], "hejsan"),
  686:     ?TEST(["xh", <<"ejsan">>], ["hej"], "hejsan"),
  687:     ?TEST(["xh", <<"e">>, "jsan"], ["hej"], "hejsan"),
  688:     ?TEST(["xh", "e", <<"jsan">>], ["hej"], "hejsan"),
  689:     ?TEST(["xh", "er", <<"ljsane">>, "rlang"], ["erl", leading], "erljsanerlang"),
  690:     ?TEST("aΩΩb", ["Ω", leading], "ΩΩb"),
  691:     ?TEST([<<"aae">>,778,"äöoo"], [[$e,778], leading], [$e,778]++"äöoo"),
  692:     ?TEST([<<"aae">>,778,"öeeåäö"], ["e", leading], "eeåäö"),
  693: 
  694:     ?TEST(["h", "ejsan"], ["", trailing], "hejsan"),
  695:     ?TEST([], ["", trailing], ""),
  696:     ?TEST([], ["hej", trailing], nomatch),
  697:     ?TEST(["h", "ejsan"], ["hej", trailing], "hejsan"),
  698:     ?TEST(["h", "e", "jsan"], ["hej", trailing], "hejsan"),
  699:     ?TEST(["xh", "e", "san"], ["hej", trailing], nomatch),
  700:     ?TEST([<<"xh">>, <<"ejsan">>], ["hej", trailing], "hejsan"),
  701:     ?TEST(["xh", <<"ejsan">>], ["hej", trailing], "hejsan"),
  702:     ?TEST(["xh", <<"e">>, "jsan"], ["hej", trailing], "hejsan"),
  703:     ?TEST(["xh", "e", <<"jsan">>], ["hej", trailing], "hejsan"),
  704:     ?TEST(["xh", "er", <<"ljsane">>, "rlang"], ["erl", trailing], "erlang"),
  705:     ?TEST("aΩΩb", ["Ω", trailing], "Ωb"),
  706:     ?TEST([<<"aae">>,778,"äöoo"], [[$e,778], trailing], [$e,778]++"äöoo"),
  707:     ?TEST([<<"aeae">>,778,"äö"], ["e", trailing], "eae"++[778,$ä,$ö]),
  708: 
  709:     ok.
  710: 
  711: lexemes(_) ->
  712:     Mod = fun(Res) ->
  713:                   [unicode:characters_to_nfc_list(io_lib:format("~ts", [Str]))|| Str <- Res]
  714:           end,
  715:     Res = ["Hej", "san", "Hopp", "san"],
  716:     ?TEST("", [" ,."],  {Mod, []}),
  717:     ?TEST("Hej san", [""],  {Mod, ["Hej san"]}),
  718:     ?TEST("  ,., ", [" ,."],  {Mod, []}),
  719:     ?TEST( "Hej san Hopp san", [" ,."], {Mod, Res}),
  720:     ?TEST(" Hej san Hopp san ", [" ,."], {Mod, Res}),
  721:     ?TEST(" Hej san, .Hopp san ", [" ,."], {Mod, Res}),
  722: 
  723:     ?TEST([" Hej san",", .Hopp san "], [" ,."], {Mod, Res}),
  724:     ?TEST([" Hej sa","n, .Hopp san "], [" ,."], {Mod, Res}),
  725:     ?TEST([" Hej san,"," .Hopp san "], [" ,."], {Mod, Res}),
  726: 
  727:     ?TEST([" Hej san",[", .Hopp san "]], [" ,."], {Mod, Res}),
  728:     ?TEST([" Hej sa",["n, .Hopp san "]], [" ,."], {Mod, Res}),
  729:     ?TEST([" Hej san,",[" .Hopp san "]], [" ,."], {Mod, Res}),
  730: 
  731:     ?TEST([" H",<<"ej san, .Hopp "/utf8>>, "san"], [" ,."], {Mod, Res}),
  732:     ?TEST([" Hej san",<<", .Hopp "/utf8>>, "san"], [" ,."], {Mod, Res}),
  733:     ?TEST([" Hej sa",<<"n, .Hopp"/utf8>>, " san"], [" ,."], {Mod, Res}),
  734:     ?TEST([" Hej san,",<<" .Hopp s"/utf8>>, "an"], [" ,."], {Mod, Res}),
  735:     ?TEST([" Hej san",[<<", .Hopp san "/utf8>>]], [" ,."], {Mod, Res}),
  736:     ?TEST([" Hej sa",[<<"n, .Hopp san "/utf8>>]], [" ,."], {Mod, Res}),
  737:     ?TEST([" Hej san,",[<<" .Hopp san "/utf8>>], <<"  ">>], [" ,."], {Mod, Res}),
  738: 
  739:     ?TEST(" Hej\r\nsan\nnl", ["\r\n\s"], {Mod, ["Hej\r\nsan", "nl"]}),
  740: 
  741:     ?TEST(["b1ec1e",778,"äöo21"], ["eo"], {Mod, ["b1",[$c,$1,$e,778,$ä,$ö],"21"]}),
  742:     ?TEST([<<"b1ec1e">>,778,"äöo21"], ["eo"], {Mod, ["b1",[$c,$1,$e,778,$ä,$ö],"21"]}),
  743:     %% Grapheme (split) tests
  744:     Str10 = [[[<<"Ã·"/utf8>>,1101],<<"Ã«"/utf8>>|<<"\"">>]],
  745:     ?TEST(Str10, [[1076]], {Mod, [unicode:characters_to_nfc_list(Str10)]}),
  746:     ?TEST("a1Ωb1Ωc1", ["Ω"], {Mod, ["a1","b1","c1"]}),
  747:     ?TEST([<<"aae">>,778,"äöoo"], [[[$e,778]]], {Mod, ["aa","äöoo"]}),
  748:     ?TEST([<<"aae">>,778,"äöo21"], [[[$e,778],$o]], {Mod, ["aa","äö","21"]}),
  749:     ?TEST([<<"aae">>,778,"öeeåäö"], ["e"], {Mod, [[$a, $a, $e,778,$ö],"åäö"]}),
  750:     ok.
  751: 
  752: nth_lexeme(_) ->
  753:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch string:nth_lexeme("test test", 0, [])),
  754:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch string:nth_lexeme(<<"test test">>, 0, [])),
  755:     ?TEST( "", [1, " ,."],  []),
  756:     ?TEST( "Hej san", [1, ""],  "Hej san"),
  757:     ?TEST( "  ,., ", [1, " ,."],  []),
  758:     ?TEST( "  ,., ", [3, " ,."],  []),
  759:     ?TEST("Hej san Hopp san", [1, " ,."], "Hej"),
  760:     ?TEST("...Hej san Hopp san", [1, " ,."], "Hej"),
  761:     ?TEST("Hej san Hopp san", [3, " ,."], "Hopp"),
  762:     ?TEST(" Hej san Hopp san ", [3, " ,."], "Hopp"),
  763:     ?TEST(" Hej san, .Hopp san ", [3, " ,."], "Hopp"),
  764:     ?TEST("ab cd", [3, " "], ""),
  765: 
  766:     ?TEST([" Hej san",", .Hopp san "], [3, " ,."], "Hopp"),
  767:     ?TEST([" Hej sa","n, .Hopp san "], [3, " ,."], "Hopp"),
  768:     ?TEST([" Hej san,"," .Hopp san "], [3, " ,."], "Hopp"),
  769: 
  770:     ?TEST([" Hej san",[", .Hopp san "]], [3," ,."], "Hopp"),
  771:     ?TEST([" Hej sa",["n, .Hopp san "]], [3, " ,."], "Hopp"),
  772:     ?TEST([" Hej san,",[" .Hopp san "]], [3, " ,."], "Hopp"),
  773: 
  774:     ?TEST([" Hej san",<<", .Hopp "/utf8>>, "san"], [3, " ,."], "Hopp"),
  775:     ?TEST([" Hej sa",<<"n, .Hopp"/utf8>>, " san"], [3, " ,."], "Hopp"),
  776:     ?TEST([" Hej san,",<<" .Hopp s"/utf8>>, "an"], [3, " ,."], "Hopp"),
  777:     ?TEST([" Hej san,",<<" .Hopp s"/utf8>>, "an"], [4, " ,."], "san"),
  778:     ?TEST([" Hej san",[<<", .Hopp san "/utf8>>]], [3, " ,."], "Hopp"),
  779:     ?TEST([" Hej sa",[<<"n, .Hopp san "/utf8>>]], [3, " ,."], "Hopp"),
  780:     ?TEST([" Hej san,",[<<" .Hopp san "/utf8>>], <<"  ">>], [3, " ,."], "Hopp"),
  781: 
  782:     ?TEST(["b1ec1e",778,"äöo21"], [3,"eo"], "21"),
  783:     ?TEST([<<"b1ec1e">>,778,"äöo21"], [3, "eo"], "21"),
  784:     %% Grapheme (split) tests
  785:     ?TEST("a1Ωb1Ωc1", [1, "Ω"], "a1"),
  786:     ?TEST([<<"aae">>,778,"äöoo"], [2,[[$e,778]]], "äöoo"),
  787:     ?TEST([<<"aae">>,778,"äöo21"], [2,[[$e,778],$o]], "äö"),
  788:     ?TEST([<<"aae">>,778,"öeeåäö"], [2,"e"], "åäö"),
  789:     ok.
  790: 
  791: 
  792: meas(Config) ->
  793:     Parent = self(),
  794:     Exec = fun() ->
  795:                    DataDir0 = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  796:                    DataDir = filename:join(lists:droplast(filename:split(DataDir0))),
  797:                    case proplists:get_value(profile, Config, false) of
  798:                        false ->
  799:                            do_measure(DataDir);
  800:                        eprof ->
  801:                            eprof:profile(fun() -> do_measure(DataDir) end, [set_on_spawn]),
  802:                            eprof:stop_profiling(),
  803:                            eprof:analyze(),
  804:                            eprof:stop()
  805:                    end,
  806:                    Parent ! {test_done, self()},
  807:                    normal
  808:            end,
  809:     ct:timetrap({minutes,2}),
  810:     case ct:get_timetrap_info() of
  811:         {_,{_,Scale}} when Scale > 1 ->
  812:             {skip,{will_not_run_in_debug,Scale}};
  813:         _ -> % No scaling, run at most 1.5 min
  814:             Tester = spawn(Exec),
  815:             receive {test_done, Tester} -> ok
  816:             after 118000 ->
  817:                     io:format("Timelimit reached stopping~n",[]),
  818:                     exit(Tester, die)
  819:             end,
  820:             ok
  821:     end.
  822: 
  823: do_measure(DataDir) ->
  824:     File =  filename:join([DataDir,"unicode_util_SUITE_data","NormalizationTest.txt"]),
  825:     io:format("File ~s ",[File]),
  826:     {ok, Bin} = file:read_file(File),
  827:     io:format("~p~n",[byte_size(Bin)]),
  828:     Do = fun(Name, Func, Mode) ->
  829:                  {N, Mean, Stddev, _} = time_func(Func, Mode, Bin, 20),
  830:                  io:format("~15w ~15w ~8.2fms ±~6.2fms #~.2w gc included~n",
  831:                            [Name, Mode, Mean/1000, Stddev/1000, N])
  832:          end,
  833:     Do2 = fun(Name, Func, Mode) ->
  834:                   {N, Mean, Stddev, _} = time_func(Func, binary, <<>>, 20),
  835:                   io:format("~15w ~15w ~8.2fms ±~6.2fms #~.2w gc included~n",
  836:                             [Name, Mode, Mean/1000, Stddev/1000, N])
  837:           end,
  838:     %% lefty_list means a list balanced to the left, like
  839:     %% [[[30],31],32]. Only some functions check such lists.
  840:     Modes = [list, lefty_list, binary, {many_lists,1}, {many_lists, 4}],
  841:     io:format("----------------------~n"),
  842: 
  843:     Do(old_tokens, fun(Str) -> string:tokens(Str, [$\n,$\r]) end, list),
  844:     Tokens = {lexemes, fun(Str) -> string:lexemes(Str, [$\n,$\r]) end},
  845:     [Do(Name,Fun,Mode) || {Name,Fun} <- [Tokens], Mode <- Modes],
  846: 
  847:     S0 = "xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxy.....",
  848:     S0B = <<"xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxy.....">>,
  849:     Do2(old_strip_l, repeat(fun() -> string:strip(S0, left, $x) end), list),
  850:     Do2(trim_l,  repeat(fun() -> string:trim(S0, leading, [$x]) end), list),
  851:     Do2(trim_l,  repeat(fun() -> string:trim(S0B, leading, [$x]) end), binary),
  852:     Do2(old_strip_r, repeat(fun() -> string:strip(S0, right, $.) end), list),
  853:     Do2(trim_t,  repeat(fun() -> string:trim(S0, trailing, [$.]) end), list),
  854:     Do2(trim_t,  repeat(fun() -> string:trim(S0B, trailing, [$.]) end), binary),
  855: 
  856:     Do2(old_chr_sub, repeat(fun() -> string:sub_string(S0, string:chr(S0, $.)) end), list),
  857:     Do2(old_str_sub, repeat(fun() -> string:sub_string(S0, string:str(S0, [$.])) end), list),
  858:     Do2(find, repeat(fun() -> string:find(S0, [$.]) end), list),
  859:     Do2(find, repeat(fun() -> string:find(S0B, [$.]) end), binary),
  860:     Do2(old_str_sub2, repeat(fun() -> N = string:str(S0, "xy.."),
  861:                         {string:sub_string(S0,1,N), string:sub_string(S0,N+4)} end), list),
  862:     Do2(split, repeat(fun() -> string:split(S0, "xy..") end), list),
  863:     Do2(split, repeat(fun() -> string:split(S0B, "xy..") end), binary),
  864: 
  865:     Do2(old_rstr_sub, repeat(fun() -> string:sub_string(S0, string:rstr(S0, [$y])) end), list),
  866:     Do2(find_t, repeat(fun() -> string:find(S0, [$y], trailing) end), list),
  867:     Do2(find_t, repeat(fun() -> string:find(S0B, [$y], trailing) end), binary),
  868:     Do2(old_rstr_sub2, repeat(fun() -> N = string:rstr(S0, "y.."),
  869:                          {string:sub_string(S0,1,N), string:sub_string(S0,N+3)} end), list),
  870:     Do2(split_t, repeat(fun() -> string:split(S0, "y..", trailing) end), list),
  871:     Do2(split_t, repeat(fun() -> string:split(S0B, "y..", trailing) end), binary),
  872: 
  873:     Do2(old_span, repeat(fun() -> N=string:span(S0, [$x, $y]),
  874:                                   {string:sub_string(S0,1,N),string:sub_string(S0,N+1)}
  875:                          end), list),
  876:     Do2(take, repeat(fun() -> string:take(S0, [$x, $y]) end), list),
  877:     Do2(take, repeat(fun() -> string:take(S0B, [$x, $y]) end), binary),
  878: 
  879:     Do2(old_cspan, repeat(fun() -> N=string:cspan(S0, [$.,$y]),
  880:                                    {string:sub_string(S0,1,N),string:sub_string(S0,N+1)}
  881:                           end), list),
  882:     Do2(take_c, repeat(fun() -> string:take(S0, [$.,$y], true) end), list),
  883:     Do2(take_c, repeat(fun() -> string:take(S0B, [$.,$y], true) end), binary),
  884: 
  885:     Do2(old_substr, repeat(fun() -> string:substr(S0, 21, 15) end), list),
  886:     Do2(slice, repeat(fun() -> string:slice(S0, 20, 15) end), list),
  887:     Do2(slice, repeat(fun() -> string:slice(S0B, 20, 15) end), binary),
  888: 
  889:     LCase  = "areaa reare rerar earea reare reare",
  890:     LCaseB = unicode:characters_to_binary(LCase),
  891:     UCase  = string:uppercase(LCase),
  892:     UCaseB = unicode:characters_to_binary(UCase),
  893: 
  894:     Do2(to_upper_0, repeat(fun() -> string:to_upper(UCase) end), list),
  895:     Do2(uppercase_0, repeat(fun() -> string:uppercase(UCase) end), list),
  896:     Do2(uppercase_0, repeat(fun() -> string:uppercase(UCaseB) end), binary),
  897:     Do2(to_upper_a, repeat(fun() -> string:to_upper(LCase) end), list),
  898:     Do2(uppercase_a, repeat(fun() -> string:uppercase(LCase) end), list),
  899:     Do2(uppercase_a, repeat(fun() -> string:uppercase(LCaseB) end), binary),
  900: 
  901:     io:format("--~n",[]),
  902:     NthTokens = {nth_lexemes, fun(Str) -> string:nth_lexeme(Str, 18000, [$\n,$\r]) end},
  903:     [Do(Name,Fun,Mode) || {Name,Fun} <- [NthTokens], Mode <- Modes],
  904:     Do2(take_t, repeat(fun() -> string:take(S0, [$.,$y], false, trailing) end), list),
  905:     Do2(take_t, repeat(fun() -> string:take(S0B, [$.,$y], false, trailing) end), binary),
  906:     Do2(take_tc, repeat(fun() -> string:take(S0, [$x], true, trailing) end), list),
  907:     Do2(take_tc, repeat(fun() -> string:take(S0B, [$x], true, trailing) end), binary),
  908: 
  909:     Length = {length, fun(Str) -> string:length(Str) end},
  910:     [Do(Name,Fun,Mode) || {Name,Fun} <- [Length], Mode <- Modes],
  911: 
  912:     Reverse = {reverse, fun(Str) -> string:reverse(Str) end},
  913:     [Do(Name,Fun,Mode) || {Name,Fun} <- [Reverse], Mode <- Modes],
  914: 
  915:     ok.
  916: 
  917: repeat(F) ->
  918:     fun(_) -> repeat_1(F,20000) end.
  919: 
  920: repeat_1(F, N) when N > 0 ->
  921:     F(),
  922:     repeat_1(F, N-1);
  923: repeat_1(_, _) ->
  924:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
  925:     ok.
  926: 
  927: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  928: %% internal functions
  929: 
  930: test(Line, Func, Str, Args, Res, Norm) ->
  931:     %%io:format("~p: ~p ~w ~w~n",[Line, Func, Str, Args]),
  932:     test_1(Line, Func, Str, [Str|norm(none,Args)], Res),
  933:     %%io:format("~p: ~p bin ",[Line, Func]),
  934:     test_1({Line,list}, Func, Str,
  935:            [unicode:characters_to_list(Str)|norm(none,Args)], Res),
  936:     Norm andalso
  937:         test_1({Line,clist}, Func, Str,
  938:                [unicode:characters_to_nfc_list(Str)|norm(nfc,Args)], Res),
  939:     Norm andalso
  940:         test_1({Line,dlist}, Func, Str,
  941:                [unicode:characters_to_nfd_list(Str)|norm(nfd,Args)], Res),
  942:     test_1({Line,bin}, Func, Str,
  943:            [unicode:characters_to_binary(Str)|norm(none, Args)], Res),
  944:     Norm andalso
  945:         test_1({Line,cbin}, Func, Str,
  946:                [unicode:characters_to_nfc_binary(Str)|norm(nfc,Args)], Res),
  947:     Norm andalso
  948:         test_1({Line,dbin}, Func, Str,
  949:                [unicode:characters_to_nfd_binary(Str)|norm(nfd,Args)], Res),
  950:     %%io:format("~n",[]),
  951:     ok.
  952: 
  953: test_1(Line, Func, Str, Args, Exp) ->
  954:     try
  955:         Res = apply(string, Func, Args),
  956:         check_types(Line, Func, Args, Res),
  957:         case res(Res, Exp) of
  958:             true -> ok;
  959:             {Res1,Exp1} when is_tuple(Exp1) ->
  960:                 io:format("~p~n",[Args]),
  961:                 io:format("~p:~p: ~ts~w =>~n  :~w:~w~n",
  962:                           [Func,Line, Str,Str,Res1,Exp1]),
  963:                 exit({error, Func});
  964:             {Res1,Exp1} ->
  965:                 io:format("~p:~p: ~ts~w =>~n  :~ts~w:~ts~w~n",
  966:                           [Func,Line, Str,Str, Res1,Res1, Exp1,Exp1]),
  967:                 exit({error, Func})
  968:         end
  969:     catch
  970:         error:Exp ->
  971:             ok;
  972:         error:Reason:Stacktrace ->
  973:             io:format("~p:~p: Crash ~p ~p~n",
  974:                       [?MODULE,Line, Reason, Stacktrace]),
  975:             exit({error, Func})
  976:     end.
  977: 
  978: norm(Type, Args) ->
  979:     Norm = case Type of
  980:                nfc -> fun unicode:characters_to_nfc_list/1;
  981:                nfd -> fun unicode:characters_to_nfd_list/1;
  982:                none -> fun(Str) -> Str end
  983:            end,
  984:     lists:map(fun({norm,Str}) -> Norm(Str);
  985:                  (Other) -> Other
  986:               end, Args).
  987: 
  988: res(Str, Str) -> true;
  989: res(Str, Exp) when is_list(Str), is_list(Exp) ->
  990:     A = unicode:characters_to_nfc_list(Str),
  991:     A==Exp orelse {A,Exp};
  992: res(Str, Exp) when is_binary(Str), is_list(Exp) ->
  993:     A = unicode:characters_to_nfc_list(Str),
  994:     A==Exp orelse {A,Exp};
  995: res(What, {Fun, Exp}) when is_function(Fun) ->
  996:     Fun(What) == Exp orelse {Fun(What), Exp};
  997: res({S1,S2}=S, {Exp1,Exp2}=E) -> %% For take
  998:     case {res(S1,Exp1), res(S2,Exp2)} of
  999:         {true, true} -> true;
 1000:         _ -> {S, E}
 1001:     end;
 1002: res(Int, Exp) ->
 1003:     Int == Exp orelse {Int, Exp}.
 1004: 
 1005: 
 1006: check_types(_Line, _Func, _Str, Res)
 1007:   when is_integer(Res); is_boolean(Res); Res =:= nomatch ->
 1008:     %% length or equal
 1009:     ok;
 1010: check_types(Line, Func, [S1,S2], Res)
 1011:   when Func =:= concat ->
 1012:     case check_types_1(type(S1),type(S2)) of
 1013:         ok ->
 1014:             case check_types_1(type(S1),type(Res)) of
 1015:                 ok -> ok;
 1016:                 {T1,T2} ->
 1017:                     io:format("Failed: ~p ~p ~p ~p~n",[Line, Func, T1, T2]),
 1018:                     io:format("  ~p ~p  => ~p~n", [S1, S2, Res]),
 1019:                     error
 1020:             end;
 1021:         _ -> ok
 1022:     end;
 1023: check_types(Line, Func, [Str|_], Res)  ->
 1024:     AddList = fun(mixed) -> mixed;
 1025:                  ({list,{list,_}}) -> {list, deep};
 1026:                  (R) ->
 1027:                       case lists:member(Func, [lexemes, tokens, split]) of
 1028:                           true -> {list, R};
 1029:                           false -> R
 1030:                       end
 1031:               end,
 1032:     try needs_check(Func) andalso (ok = check_types_1(AddList(type(Str)), type(Res))) of
 1033:         ok -> ok;
 1034:         false -> ok
 1035:     catch _:{badmatch, {T1,T2}} ->
 1036:             io:format("Failed: ~p ~p: ~p ~p~n",[Line, Func, T1, T2]),
 1037:             io:format("  ~p  => ~p~n", [Str, Res]),
 1038:             error;
 1039:           _:Reason:Stacktrace ->
 1040:             io:format("Crash: ~p in~n ~p~n",[Reason, Stacktrace]),
 1041:             io:format("Failed: ~p ~p: ~p => ~p~n", [Line, Func, Str, Res]),
 1042:             exit({Reason, Stacktrace})
 1043:     end.
 1044: 
 1045: check_types_1(T, T) ->
 1046:     ok;
 1047: check_types_1(Str, Res)
 1048:   when is_binary(Str), is_binary(Res) ->
 1049:     ok;
 1050: check_types_1({list, _},{list, undefined}) ->
 1051:     ok;
 1052: check_types_1({list, _},{list, codepoints}) ->
 1053:     ok;
 1054: check_types_1({list, {list, _}},{list, {list, codepoints}}) ->
 1055:     ok;
 1056: check_types_1(mixed,_) ->
 1057:     ok;
 1058: check_types_1({list, binary}, binary) ->
 1059:     ok;
 1060: check_types_1({list, binary}, {other, _, _}) -> %% take
 1061:     ok;
 1062: check_types_1({list, deep}, _) ->
 1063:     ok;
 1064: check_types_1({list, {list, deep}}, _) ->
 1065:     ok;
 1066: check_types_1(_, {error,_}) ->
 1067:     ok;
 1068: check_types_1(T1,T2) ->
 1069:     {T1,T2}.
 1070: 
 1071: type(Bin) when is_binary(Bin) ->
 1072:     binary;
 1073: type([]) ->
 1074:     {list, undefined};
 1075: type(List) when is_list(List) ->
 1076:     Deep = fun(L) when is_list(L) ->
 1077:                    lists:any(fun(C) -> is_list(C) orelse is_binary(C) end, L);
 1078:               (_) -> false
 1079:            end,
 1080:     case all(fun(C) -> not is_binary(C) end, List) of
 1081:         true ->
 1082:             case all(fun(C) -> is_integer(C) end, List) of
 1083:                 true -> {list, codepoints};
 1084:                 false ->
 1085:                     case [deep || L <- List, Deep(L)] of
 1086:                         [] -> {list, {list, codepoints}};
 1087:                         _ -> {list, deep}
 1088:                     end
 1089:             end;
 1090:         false ->
 1091:             case all(fun(C) -> is_binary(C) end, List) of
 1092:                 true -> {list, binary};
 1093:                 false -> mixed
 1094:             end
 1095:     end;
 1096: type({Number, String}) when is_number(Number) ->
 1097:     %% to_integer or to_float
 1098:     type(String);
 1099: type({Atom, _}=What) when is_atom(Atom) ->
 1100:     What;
 1101: type({R1,R2}) ->
 1102:     case {type(R1),type(R2)} of
 1103:         {T,T} -> T;
 1104:         {{list,undefined}, {list,codepoints}} -> {list,codepoints};
 1105:         {{list,codepoints}, {list,undefined}} -> {list,codepoints};
 1106:         {T1,T2} -> {other, T1,T2}
 1107:     end;
 1108: type(Other) ->
 1109:     {other, Other}.
 1110: 
 1111: all(_Check, []) ->
 1112:     true;
 1113: all(Check, [H|T]) ->
 1114:     Check(H) andalso all(Check,T);
 1115: all(Check, Bin) when is_binary(Bin) ->
 1116:     Check(Bin).
 1117: 
 1118: needs_check(reverse) -> false;
 1119: needs_check(pad) -> false;
 1120: needs_check(replace) -> false;
 1121: needs_check(_) -> true.
 1122: 
 1123: %%%% Timer stuff
 1124: 
 1125: time_func(Fun, Mode, Bin, Repeat) ->
 1126:     %% Let emulator catch up and clean things before test runs
 1127:     timer:sleep(100),
 1128: 
 1129:     %% We're spawning with a minimum heap size of 1k because certain benchmarks
 1130:     %% (e.g. string_lexemes_binary) keep very little heap data alive, making
 1131:     %% them very sensitive to changes in GC behavior.
 1132:     %%
 1133:     %% If we don't do this, something as benign as shrinking a stack frame can
 1134:     %% make things run slower by making it stick to a smaller heap size,
 1135:     %% causing it to GC more often.
 1136:     Self = self(),
 1137:     Pid = spawn_opt(fun() ->
 1138:                             Str = mode(Mode, Bin),
 1139:                             Res = time_func(0,0,0, Fun, Str, undefined, Repeat),
 1140:                             Self ! {self(), Res}
 1141:                     end, [link, {min_heap_size, 1 bsl 10}]),
 1142:     receive {Pid,Msg} -> Msg end.
 1143: 
 1144: time_func(N,Sum,SumSq, Fun, Str, _, Repeat) when N < Repeat ->
 1145:     {Time, Res} = timer:tc(fun() -> Fun(Str) end),
 1146:     time_func(N+1,Sum+Time,SumSq+Time*Time, Fun, Str, Res, Repeat);
 1147: time_func(N,Sum,SumSq, _, _, Res, _) ->
 1148:     Mean = round(Sum / N),
 1149:     Stdev = round(math:sqrt((SumSq - (Sum*Sum/N))/(N - 1))),
 1150:     {N, Mean, Stdev, Res}.
 1151: 
 1152: mode(binary, Bin) -> Bin;
 1153: mode(list, Bin) -> unicode:characters_to_list(Bin);
 1154: mode(lefty_list, Bin) ->
 1155:     L = unicode:characters_to_list(Bin),
 1156:     to_left(L);
 1157: mode({many_lists, N}, Bin) ->
 1158:     group(unicode:characters_to_list(Bin), N).
 1159: 
 1160: group([], _N) ->
 1161:     [];
 1162: group(L, N) ->
 1163:     try lists:split(N, L) of
 1164:         {L1, L2} ->
 1165:             [L1 | group(L2, N)]
 1166:     catch
 1167:         _:_ ->
 1168:             [L]
 1169:     end.
 1170: 
 1171: to_left([]) ->
 1172:     [];
 1173: to_left([H|L]) ->
 1174:     to_left([H], L).
 1175: 
 1176: to_left(V, []) ->
 1177:     V;
 1178: to_left(V, [H|L]) ->
 1179:     to_left([V,H], L).
 1180: 
 1181: %%
 1182: %% Old string lists Test cases starts here.
 1183: %%
 1184: 
 1185: len(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1186:     0 = string:len(""),
 1187:     L = tuple_size(list_to_tuple(atom_to_list(?MODULE))),
 1188:     L = string:len(atom_to_list(?MODULE)),
 1189:     %% invalid arg type
 1190:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch string:len({})),
 1191:     ok.
 1192: 
 1193: old_equal(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1194:     true = string:equal("", ""),
 1195:     false = string:equal("", " "),
 1196:     true = string:equal("laban", "laban"),
 1197:     false = string:equal("skvimp", "skvump"),
 1198:     ok.
 1199: 
 1200: old_concat(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1201:     "erlang rules" = string:concat("erlang ", "rules"),
 1202:     "" = string:concat("", ""),
 1203:     "x" = string:concat("x", ""),
 1204:     "y" = string:concat("", "y"),
 1205:     %% invalid arg type
 1206:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch string:concat(hello, please)),
 1207:     ok.

 1209: chr_rchr(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1210:     {_,_,X} = erlang:timestamp(),
 1211:     0 = string:chr("", (X rem (255-32)) + 32),
 1212:     0 = string:rchr("", (X rem (255-32)) + 32),
 1213:     1 = string:chr("x", $x),
 1214:     1 = string:rchr("x", $x),
 1215:     1 = string:chr("xx", $x),
 1216:     2 = string:rchr("xx", $x),
 1217:     3 = string:chr("xyzyx", $z),
 1218:     3 = string:rchr("xyzyx", $z),
 1219:     %% invalid arg type
 1220:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch string:chr(hello, $h)),
 1221:     %% invalid arg type
 1222:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch string:chr("hello", h)),
 1223:     %% invalid arg type
 1224:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch string:rchr(hello, $h)),
 1225:     %% invalid arg type
 1226:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch string:rchr("hello", h)),
 1227:     ok.
 1228: 
 1229: str_rstr(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1230:     {_,_,X} = erlang:timestamp(),
 1231:     0 = string:str("", [(X rem (255-32)) + 32]),
 1232:     0 = string:rstr("", [(X rem (255-32)) + 32]),
 1233:     1 = string:str("x", "x"),

 1240:     3 = string:rstr("xy z yx", " z"),
 1241:     3 = string:str("aaab", "ab"),
 1242:     %% invalid arg type

 1244:     %% invalid arg type
 1245:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch string:str("hello", he)),
 1246:     %% invalid arg type
 1247:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch string:rstr(hello, "he")),
 1248:     %% invalid arg type
 1249:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch string:rstr("hello", he)),
 1250:     ok.

 1296: old_tokens(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1297:     [] = string:tokens("",""),
 1298:     [] = string:tokens("abc","abc"),
 1299:     ["abc"] = string:tokens("abc", ""),
 1300:     ["1","2 34","45","5","6","7"] = do_tokens("1,2 34,45;5,;6;,7", ";,"),
 1301: 
 1302:     %% invalid arg type
 1303:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch string:tokens('x,y', ",")),
 1304:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch string:tokens("x,y", ',')),
 1305:     ok.
 1306: 
 1307: do_tokens(S0, Sep0) ->
 1308:     [H|T] = Sep0,
 1309:     S = [replace_sep(C, T, H) || C <- S0],
 1310:     Sep = [H],
 1311:     io:format("~p ~p\n", [S0,Sep0]),
 1312:     io:format("~p ~p\n", [S,Sep]),
 1313: 
 1314:     Res = string:tokens(S0, Sep0),
 1315:     Res = string:tokens(Sep0++S0, Sep0),
 1316:     Res = string:tokens(S0++Sep0, Sep0),
 1317: 
 1318:     Res = string:tokens(S, Sep),
 1319:     Res = string:tokens(Sep++S, Sep),
 1320:     Res = string:tokens(S++Sep, Sep),
 1321: 
 1322:     Res.
 1323: 
 1324: replace_sep(C, Seps, New) ->
 1325:     case lists:member(C, Seps) of
 1326: 	true -> New;
 1327: 	false -> C
 1328:     end.
 1329: 
 1330: chars(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1331:     [] = string:chars($., 0),
 1332:     [] = string:chars($., 0, []),
 1333:     10 = erlang:length(string:chars(32, 10, [])),
 1334:     "aaargh" = string:chars($a, 3, "rgh"),
 1335:     %% invalid arg type
 1336:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch string:chars($x, [])),
 1337:     ok.

 1364: strip(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1365:     "" = string:strip(""),
 1366:     "" = string:strip("", both),
 1367:     "" = string:strip("", both, $.),
 1368:     "hej" = string:strip("  hej  "),
 1369:     "hej  " = string:strip("  hej  ", left),
 1370:     "  hej" = string:strip("  hej  ", right),
 1371:     "  hej  " = string:strip("  hej  ", right, $.),
 1372:     "hej  hopp" = string:strip("  hej  hopp  ", both),
 1373:     %% invalid arg type
 1374:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch string:strip(hej)),
 1375:     %% invalid arg type
 1376:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch string:strip(" hej", up)),
 1377:     %% invalid arg type
 1378:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch string:strip(" hej", left, " ")),	% not good
 1379:     ok.

 1393: left_right(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1394:     "" = string:left("", 0),
 1395:     "" = string:left("hej", 0),
 1396:     "" = string:left("hej", 0, $.),
 1397:     "" = string:right("", 0),
 1398:     "" = string:right("hej", 0),
 1399:     "" = string:right("hej", 0, $.),
 1400:     "123  " = string:left("123 ", 5),
 1401:     "  123" = string:right(" 123", 5),
 1402:     "123!!" = string:left("123!", 5, $!),
 1403:     "==123" = string:right("=123", 5, $=),
 1404:     "1" = string:left("123", 1, $.),
 1405:     "3" = string:right("123", 1, $.),
 1406:     %% invalid arg type
 1407:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch string:left(hello, 5)),
 1408:     %% invalid arg type
 1409:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch string:right(hello, 5)),
 1410:     %% invalid arg type
 1411:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch string:left("hello", 5, ".")),
 1412:     %% invalid arg type
 1413:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch string:right("hello", 5, ".")),
 1414:     ok.
 1415:

 1424:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch string:sub_string("", 2, 2)),
 1425:     "1234" = string:sub_string("1234", 1),
 1426:     "1234" = string:sub_string("1234", 1, 4),
 1427:     "1234" = string:sub_string("1234", 1, 5),

 1453: old_to_integer(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1454:     {0,""} = test_to_integer("0"),
 1455:     {0,""} = test_to_integer(lists:duplicate(200, $0)),
 1456:     {1,""} = test_to_integer("1"),
 1457:     {1,""} = test_to_integer("+1"),
 1458:     {1,""} = test_to_integer("0001"),
 1459:     {-1,""} = test_to_integer("-1"),
 1460:     {1,"="} = test_to_integer("1="),
 1461:     {7,"F"} = test_to_integer("7F"),
 1462:     {709,""} = test_to_integer("709"),
 1463:     {709,"*2"} = test_to_integer("709*2"),
 1464:     {0,"xAB"} = test_to_integer("0xAB"),
 1465:     {16,"#FF"} = test_to_integer("16#FF"),
 1466: 
 1467:     %% Test a bignum.
 1468:     Big = 12385792987438978973984398348974398593,
 1469:     NegBig = -Big,
 1470:     BigString = integer_to_list(Big),
 1471:     {Big,"tail"} = string:to_integer(BigString ++ "tail"),
 1472:     {Big,"tail"} = string:to_integer("+" ++ BigString ++ "tail"),
 1473:     {NegBig,"tail"} = string:to_integer("-" ++ BigString ++ "tail"),
 1474: 
 1475:     %% Test errors.
 1476:     {error,no_integer} = test_to_integer(""),
 1477:     {error,no_integer} = test_to_integer("!1"),
 1478:     {error,no_integer} = test_to_integer("F1"),
 1479:     {error,badarg} = test_to_integer('23'),
 1480:     %% {3,[[]]} = test_to_integer([$3,[]]),
 1481:     %% {3,[hello]} = test_to_integer([$3,hello]),
 1482:     {error,badarg} = test_to_integer([$3,hello]),
 1483: 
 1484:     %% Test the internal string:list_to_integer/1 BIF directly.
 1485:     {error,not_a_list} = string:list_to_integer(abc),
 1486:     {error,no_integer} = string:list_to_integer(""),
 1487:     {error,no_integer} = string:list_to_integer("+"),
 1488: 
 1489:     ok.
 1490: 
 1491: test_to_integer(Str) ->
 1492:     %% io:format("Checking ~p~n", [Str]),
 1493:     case string:to_integer(Str) of
 1494: 	{error,_Reason} = Bad ->
 1495: 	    {'EXIT',_} = (catch list_to_integer(Str)),
 1496: 	    Bad;
 1497: 	{F,_Rest} = Res ->
 1498: 	    _ = integer_to_list(F),
 1499: 	    Res
 1500:     end.
 1501: 
 1502: old_to_float(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1503:     {1.2,""} = test_to_float("1.2"),
 1504:     {1.2,""} = test_to_float("1,2"),
 1505:     {120.0,""} = test_to_float("1.2e2"),
 1506:     {120.0,""} = test_to_float("+1,2e2"),
 1507:     {-120.0,""} = test_to_float("-1.2e2"),
 1508:     {-120.0,""} = test_to_float("-1,2e+2"),
 1509:     {-1.2e-2,""} = test_to_float("-1.2e-2"),
 1510:     {1.2,"="} = test_to_float("1.2="),
 1511:     {7.9,"e"} = test_to_float("7.9e"),
 1512:     {7.9,"ee"} = test_to_float("7.9ee"),
 1513:     {7.9,"e+"} = test_to_float("7.9e+"),
 1514:     {7.9,"e-"} = test_to_float("7.9e-"),
 1515:     {7.9,"e++"} = test_to_float("7.9e++"),
 1516:     {7.9,"e--"} = test_to_float("7.9e--"),
 1517:     {7.9,"e+e"} = test_to_float("7.9e+e"),
 1518:     {7.9,"e-e"} = test_to_float("7.9e-e"),
 1519:     {7.9,"e+."} = test_to_float("7.9e+."),
 1520:     {7.9,"e-."} = test_to_float("7.9e-."),
 1521:     {7.9,"e+,"} = test_to_float("7.9e+,"),
 1522:     {7.9,"e-,"} = test_to_float("7.9e-,"),
 1523:     {error,no_float} = test_to_float(""),
 1524:     {error,no_float} = test_to_float("e1,0"),
 1525:     {error,no_float} = test_to_float("1;0"),
 1526:     {error,no_float} = test_to_float("1"),
 1527:     {error,no_float} = test_to_float("1e"),
 1528:     {error,no_float} = test_to_float("2."),
 1529:     {error,badarg} = test_to_float('2.3'),
 1530:     %{2.3,[[]]} = test_to_float([$2,$.,$3,[]]),
 1531:     {2.3,[]} = test_to_float([$2,$.,$3,[]]),
 1532:     %%{2.3,[hello]} = test_to_float([$2,$.,$3,hello]),
 1533:     {error, badarg} = test_to_float([$2,$.,$3,hello]),
 1534:     ok.
 1535: 
 1536: test_to_float(Str) ->
 1537:     %% io:format("Checking ~p~n", [Str]),
 1538:     case string:to_float(Str) of
 1539: 	{error,_Reason} = Bad ->
 1540: 	    {'EXIT',_} = (catch list_to_float(Str)),
 1541: 	    Bad;
 1542: 	{F,_Rest} = Res ->
 1543: 	    _ = float_to_list(F),
 1544: 	    Res
 1545:     end.
 1546: 
 1547: to_upper_to_lower(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1548:     "1234ABCDEFÅÄÖ=" = string_to_upper("1234abcdefåäö="),
 1549:     "éèíúùòóåäöabc()" = string_to_lower("ÉÈÍÚÙÒÓÅÄÖabc()"),
 1550:     All = lists:seq(0, 255),
 1551: 
 1552:     UC = string_to_upper(All),
 1553:     256 = erlang:length(UC),
 1554:     all_upper_latin1(UC, 0),
 1555: 
 1556:     LC = string_to_lower(All),
 1557:     all_lower_latin1(LC, 0),
 1558: 
 1559:     LC = string_to_lower(string_to_upper(LC)),
 1560:     LC = string_to_lower(string_to_upper(UC)),
 1561:     UC = string_to_upper(string_to_lower(LC)),
 1562:     UC = string_to_upper(string_to_lower(UC)),
 1563: 
 1564:     ok.
 1565: 
 1566: string_to_lower(Str) ->
 1567:     Res = string:to_lower(Str),
 1568:     Res = [string:to_lower(C) || C <- Str].
 1569: 
 1570: string_to_upper(Str) ->
 1571:     Res = string:to_upper(Str),
 1572:     Res = [string:to_upper(C) || C <- Str].
 1573: 
 1574: all_upper_latin1([C|T], C) when 0 =< C, C < $a;
 1575: 				$z < C, C < 16#E0;
 1576: 				C =:= 16#F7; C =:= 16#FF ->
 1577:     all_upper_latin1(T, C+1);
 1578: all_upper_latin1([H|T], C) when $a =< C, C =< $z;
 1579: 				16#E0 =< C, C =< 16#F6;
 1580: 				16#F8 =< C, C =< 16#FE ->
 1581:     H = C - 32,
 1582:     all_upper_latin1(T, C+1);
 1583: all_upper_latin1([], 256) -> ok.
 1584: 
 1585: all_lower_latin1([C|T], C) when 0 =< C, C < $A;
 1586: 				$Z < C, C < 16#C0;
 1587: 				C =:= 16#D7;
 1588: 				16#DF =< C, C =< 255 ->
 1589:     all_lower_latin1(T, C+1);
 1590: all_lower_latin1([H|T], C) when $A =< C, C =< $Z;
 1591: 				16#C0 =< C, C =< 16#F6;
 1592: 				16#C8 =< C, C =< 16#DE ->
 1593:     % io:format("~p\n", [{H,C}]),
 1594:     H = C + 32,
 1595:     all_lower_latin1(T, C+1);
 1596: all_lower_latin1([], 256) -> ok.
 1597: 
 1598: join(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1599:     "erlang rules" = string:join(["erlang", "rules"], " "),
 1600:     "a,-,b,-,c" = string:join(["a", "b", "c"], ",-,"),
 1601:     "1234" = string:join(["1", "2", "3", "4"], ""),
 1602:     [] = string:join([], ""), % OTP-7231
 1603:     %% invalid arg type
 1604:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch string:join([apa], "")),
 1605:     ok.
